title.@_cdata: Kejriwal sounds poll bugle in Punjab, says I don't fear Badals]

description.@_cdata: Hitting out at the Badals, the ruling family of Punjab, the Delhi chief minister said that once his party comes to power, it will launch a commission of inquiry against the family to investigate their 'misrule' in last ten years and send them behind bars.]

title.@_cdata: Kai Po Che! International kite festival takes off with flying colours]

description.@_cdata: The festival begins on Uttarayana, the day when winter starts turning into summer, and will conclude on Makar Sankranti.]

title.@_cdata: Foreign Secretary-level talks deferred; India agrees to Pak SIT visit]

description.@_cdata: India and Pakistan on Thursday deferred their foreign secretary-level talks to "very near future" even as government here welcomed the apprehending of Jaish-e- Mohammad members linked to the Pathankot terror attack and agreed to the visit of a Pakistani SIT.]

title.@_cdata: 'Mamata must restore confidence of Hindus in Kaliachak']

description.@_cdata: 'People are tense. The morale of the perpetrators of the Kaliachak attack is very high.']

title.@_cdata: 'Jacko, your reward will be in heaven'  ]

description.@_cdata: Tarun Vijay, MP, salutes the General whom he adored as a great friend.  ]

title.@_cdata: Sydney Opera House evacuated after bomb threat]

description.@_cdata: All tours of the Opera House were also cancelled for the day and ferries were either delayed or cancelled.]
